creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: rectangular apron with black side edges and seed fringe; geometric cross stitch bands in red and white separated by appliqued bands of orange, green, white, yellow and black; apron strings have geometric cross stitch in black and white on red; ties 20" long with white muslin lining
title: Apron
